QuestData.Title: Flamebreaker
QuestData.Description: The large elementals that besiege us are not a singular entity.$B$BThey are an amalgamation of lesser spirits bound together by the Twilight's Hammer cultists' magic.$B$BThe rebuilt flameseer's staff will give us enough power to shatter its bonds.$B$BDestroy the smaller elementals once you've broken up the more dangerous large ones.
QuestData.RewardText: Well done, $n. This will help us turn the tide against the enemy.
